Articles.Content:
I'm a bit confused about the update proces for the standalone (non-steam non-epic) version? Do I download the new version and overwrite the old game folder? Or am I missing something?

I've been googling around but haven't found much answers. Might be overlooking something or the info is missing or too vague..

Looking forward to your answers!

Stuntel

Here's what I did. 

Go to the PD website>your account overview >game downloads>New 0.1.1 patched Game download will be seen here

Unfortunately, AFAICT, there is no way to get just a patch. So, I just copied my config files that sit just inside the old KSP2_x64 file over to the new one.

Hope this helps

I just unpacked the new one over the old one.

 

Homer

Thanks everybody. I installed over the old version and it worked fine. I hope there will be a launcher in the future to make it easier.

 

For now, it might be a good idea if the devs put some instructions on the download page to avoid confusion.
